about_the_game:
"In the whirlwind of daily PC use, it's refreshing to have a cheerful assembly of friends bobbing around your screen. They're here to remind you of the lighter sides of life."
- Marco K. Cappello

This is a lighter version of the critically acclaimed, award-winning, champion of relaxation Placid Plastic Duck Simulator.

No pools. No slides. No airplanes. No splash sounds.

THIS
HAS
JUST
DUCKS

Enjoy a slice of the PPDS magic right on your desktop.
detailed_description:
Further turbolento Highlights


Feature List

  • Exclusive Duck Selection: Access all the beloved ducks from PPDS's basic version. Choose your favorites to grace your desktop.
  • Customizable Experience: Via the collection panel, handpick your duck companions. Choose between a perspective and an orthogonal camera. Always on top or not.
  • Immediate Access to All Ducks: Dive straight into the fun with zero wait time. All ducks are unlocked and ready to float into your digital space from the get-go.
  • Timmy Stays Put: In this desktop version, our adventurous Timmy won’t fly away. He’s here to stay, keeping you company till the end of time.


About the Software

"In the whirlwind of daily PC use, it's refreshing to have a cheerful assembly of friends bobbing around your screen. They're here to remind you of the lighter sides of life."
- Marco K. Cappello

This is a lighter version of the critically acclaimed, award-winning, champion of relaxation Placid Plastic Duck Simulator.

HAS
JUST
DUCKS

Enjoy a slice of the PPDS magic right on your desktop.
name: Placid Plastic Desktop

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Bring your favorite ducks directly to your desktop! Choose from a vibrant selection of rubber ducks and let them help you stay focused at your desk. Whether you're working, studying, or playing, these are the ducks that will always be by your side.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
